snippet.title: Indie Horror Game - Greed Stays Home, announcement trailer.
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200460/Greed_Stays_Home/

Thank you all for the incredible support on my debut game, Befriended Curse!

I'm excited to share that I’m currently working on my next indie horror project, Greed Stays Home. This game takes place in a mysterious village frozen in time, trapped in the eerie atmosphere of the mid-20th century.

Make sure to add it to your Steam wishlist so you don’t miss any updates!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200460/Greed_Stays_Home/
